about_the_game:
​🎮 Welcome to Hentai Clicker: Kristina is Streaming

Step into a festive wonderland of allure and thrill with Hentai Clicker: Kristina is Streaming! Kristina, the enchanting and playful Mrs. Claus, is live and ready to captivate. Click to collect ❤️, unwrap her secrets, and dive into a seductive, interactive holiday adventure filled with exciting surprises!

🍑 About the Game

Enter Kristina’s snowy yet steamy world, where every click takes you closer to unveiling her festive surprises. Gather hearts, unlock stunning holiday outfits, and achieve thrilling milestones in a game where Christmas is always naughty. Boost your abilities to collect hearts faster and progress through Kristina’s magical, seductive story.

🔞 Premium Version

Unlock the full potential of Hentai Clicker: Kristina is Streaming by purchasing the uncensored version of the game! Experience hardcore, explicit sex scenes that are only available in the premium edition.

🎉 Features

  • 🎨 Stunning Anime Art: Gorgeous anime-style visuals bring Kristina to life in all her holiday glory.

  • 🔞 Explicit Content: Enjoy uncensored, intimate scenes with Kristina in the premium version.

  • 🎯 Exciting Goals: Unlock new stages and outfits, from cozy Christmas sweaters to barely-there festive surprises. 

  • 🖱️ Addictive Clicker Gameplay: Simple and engaging mechanics will keep you coming back for more holiday fun.

  • 💪 Ability Upgrades: Increase your heart collection speed with powerful upgrades.

  • 👗 Sexy Wardrobe: Discover a range of seductive holiday outfits in both the free and premium versions.

  • 🔥 Interactive Experience: Enjoy dynamic dialogue, Kristina’s flirtatious voice acting, and festive surprises that respond to your progress.

💖 Why You’ll Love It

Hentai Clicker: Kristina is Streaming isn’t just a game—it’s a playful, festive experience! Whether you’re enchanted by the gorgeous artwork, hooked by the clicker gameplay, or mesmerized by Kristina’s charm, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.

🎮 How to Play

  • 🖱️ Click to Collect Hearts: The more you click, the more hearts you gather!

  • 🔓 Unlock New Stages: Use hearts to reveal Kristina’s stunning outfits and secret holiday scenes.

  • 🚀 Upgrade Your Skills: Invest in upgrades to boost your heart collection rate and progress faster.

🎉 Join the Festivities!

Ready to unwrap Kristina’s secrets? Start playing Hentai Clicker: Kristina is Streaming today and discover the steamy surprises that await this holiday season!

🎅 A Naughty Christmas Adventure Awaits!

Play now and let Kristina make your holidays unforgettable!

content_descriptors.notes: The character takes off his clothes as the levels progress. Nudity appears from the very first levels, culminating in explicit sexual acts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11
  • Processor: Apple Silicon and Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
